system.effect: Exactly what it says. +10 to any social skill test to influence visitors aboar vessel, and +25 Achievement Points for Trade/Criminal Objective. Poor: -10 Social Test due to bad impressions, Good: +15 to Social Tests, Best: +20 to Social Tests (instead of the +10). One Per Vessel.
